1:
Yahweh, you have become the King!\q2 The majesty and the power that you have are like robes that a king wears.
\q1 You put the world firmly in place, and it will never be moved out of its place.
\q1
2:
You started to rule as king a very long time ago;\q2 you have always existed.



\q1
3:
Yahweh, when you created the world, you separated the water from the chaotic mass and formed oceans,\q2 and the waves of the waters of those oceans still roar,
\q1
4:
but you are greater than the roar of those oceans,\q2 more powerful than the ocean waves!
\q2 You are Yahweh, the one who is greater than any other god!



\q1
5:
Yahweh, your laws never change,\q2 and your temple has always been holy.
\q2 That will be true forever.
